barcelona_target: Increase citizen participation in water and sanitation management
target_line_2030: Increase the budgetary effort for projects relating to water and sanitation in member cities located in countries receiving Official Development Assistance, especially those projects relating to the efficient, sustainable management of the water cycle in urban and metropolitan contexts
target_name: Provide support for and foster the participation of local communities in the improvement of water and sanitation management
